item.title: Physical Sovereignty Crisis: Back Pain Flare & Response
item.description:
Physical Sovereignty Crisis: Back Pain Flare & Response

Summary: Acute back pain flare: care-provider recon showed systemic delays. Decision: book future specialist slot, deploy immediate countermeasures, pivot to root cause via mattress procurement.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batch 2

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.
